caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3. Localities where
Hyperioides sibaginis
was captured during this survey. x 2: two samples at same localities in different cruises.

Distribution . Pacific Ocean. In the eastern Pacific from California , USA , and the Gulf of California , Mexico , to Panama ( Brusca & Hendrickx 2005 , García Madrigal 2007 ).

Remarks . Siegel-Causey (1992) reported
H. sibaginis
as an uncommon species in the southern Gulf of California , with a distribution pattern similar to
H. longipes
. According to García Madrigal (2007) this species occurs between
0‒ 200 m
. It was one of the two most abundant species in this survey.
